entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
